title: TNF Preview, Week 7 WR/CB Matchups 2022
description:
Field Yates, Mike Clay and Daniel Dopp preview a friendlier Thursday Night Football for fantasy before dishing out the WR’s who have great matchups and the WR’s who you may need to bench. Then, Adam Schefter joins to talk the storylines to watch in Week 7 including who needs to be on your radar for a late season push.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: TNF Preview, What WR's To Start & Sit, Adam Schefter Joins The Show
